record.moveDownRow: Mover el campo una fila hacia abajo

record.error.leader.length: No se puede guardar el registro. La cabecera debe contener 24 caracteres, incluidos los espacios vacíos.
record.error.tag.length: Record cannot be saved. Each field must contain three characters in the first text box of each row.
record.error.leader.fixedFieldMismatch: No se puede guardar el registro. La cabecera y el 008 no coinciden.
record.load.error: No se puede encontrar o cargar el registro.
record.save.success.processing: Este registro se ha guardado correctamente y está en proceso. Es posible que los cambios no aparezcan de inmediato.
record.save.error.illegalFixedLength: Registro no guardado. Compruebe la longitud de los caracteres de los campos fijos.
record.saveNew.onSave: Creating record may take several seconds.
record.saveNew.error: Unable to create record due to system error. Please try again or contact support.
record.saveNew.delay: Creating this record is taking longer than expected. Please check back later if record is available or contact support.

record.error.leader.forbiddenBytes.holdi: El registro no se puede guardar. Por favor, compruebe la cabecera. Sólo las posiciones 5, 6, 17, 18 pueden editarse en el campo de cabecera.
record.error.leader.invalidPositionValue: Record cannot be saved. Wrong value "{value}" on position {position} of the Leader. Allowed only: [{values}]

record.error.leader.forbiddenBytes.autho: No se puede guardar el registro. Por favor, revise la cabecera. Solo las posiciones 5, 17, 18 pueden ser editadas en el campo de cabecera
record.error.leader.initial.invalidPosit: Record cannot be saved. Cannot edit 008 due to invalid {positions}. Please update this record's {positions}. Valid values are listed at {link}
record.error.controlField.multiple: Record cannot be saved. Can only have one MARC 001.
record.save.error.notFound: This record has been deleted by another user. You can no longer edit this record, hit the cancel button to return to the previous page.
quickMARC: Can Link/unlink authority records to bib records
record.fieldDeleted: Field {tag} has been deleted from this MARC record.
record.link.success: El campo 1{tag}1 ha sido 1linked1 a un registro de autoridad MARC
record.unlink.confirm.title: Desenlace del registro de autoridad MARC
record.unlink.confirm.message: Seleccionando Unlink, el campo {tag} será desvinculado del registro de autoridad MARC. ¿Está seguro de que desea continuar?
remove-authority-linking.modal.label: Eliminar los enlaces de autoridad
remove-authority-linking.modal.message: ¿Desea eliminar el enlace de autoridad para este nuevo registro bibliográfico?

record.save.error.derive: Instance cannot be updated. Deprecated instance version.
permission.quick-marc-editor.duplicate: quickMARC: Derivar un nuevo registro bibliográfico MARC
record.link.validation.invalidHeading: Ha seleccionado un encabezamiento no válido basado en el campo bibliográfico que desea controlar. Por favor, revise su selección.
record.error.1xx.change: Cannot change the saved MARC authority field {tag} because it controls a bibliographic field(s). To change this 1XX, you must unlink all controlled bibliographic fields.
record.error.1xx.add$t: Cannot add a $t to the ${tag} field because it controls a bibliographic field(s) that cannot control this subfield. To change this 1XX value, you must unlink all controlled bibliographic fields that cannot control $t.
record.error.1xx.remove$t: Cannot remove $t from the ${tag} field because it controls a bibliographic field(s) that requires this subfield. To change this 1XX value, you must unlink all controlled bibliographic fields that requires $t to be controlled.
record.save.updatingLinkedBibRecords: Record has been updated. {count} linked bibliographic record(s) updates have begun.
update-linked-bib-fields.modal.label: Are you sure?
update-linked-bib-fields.modal.message-s: {count} {count, plural, one {bibliographic record} other {bibliographic records}} {count, plural, one {is} other {are}} linked to this authority record and will be updated by clicking the Save button.
record.error.fieldCantBeSaved: {fieldTags} has a subfield(s) that cannot be saved because the field is controlled by an authority record.
record.error.fieldsCantBeSaved: {fieldTags}{count, plural, one {} =2 { and {lastFieldTag}} other {, and {lastFieldTag}}} has a subfield(s) that cannot be saved because the fields are controlled by authority records.
record.error.010.edit$a: Cannot add or edit 010 $a for an authority record linked to a bibliographic record. To make this change, you must unlink this authority record from bibliographic records.
